name: Timéo's Lightmare
description:
Ludum Dare's page

Timéo is having a nightmare, help him fight spooky monsters with light! But be careful, your parents are around, and will rumble you if you stay up!

The only end for now is to be caught by nightmare or parent. 

If you have more than one light on when Timeo's parents comes they know that he's not actually sleeping. 

Arrow keys are supported. 

Thanks for playing hope you enjoyed!
